name: My Desert Diaries Collection 02/07
description:
This series of artworks illustrate different vignettes of Dr Haillie Mells trips around different deserts of this and other worlds, with the mission of finding and bringing back inspiration, illumination and healing to her community.

“There is an hour of the afternoon when the plain is on the verge of saying something. It never says, or perhaps it says it infinitely, or perhaps we do not understand it, or we understand it and it is untranslatable as music.”

― Jorge Luis Borges


——
There will be 7 pieces in this collection (MDD: Book 02), soon available for collecting here.
